ygData.subject: Quests, Jewelry Making...
ygData.msgSnippet: Good morning everybody :) I was wondering if there are any Erudite Enchanter Quests out there that aren t listed on the Alakhazam site? I was so excited to get
ygData.messageBody:
Good morning everybody :) I was wondering if there are any Erudite
Enchanter Quests out there that aren't listed on the Alakhazam site?
I was so excited to get to level 12 so I could use my Dark Elf
Illusion spell to finish the Stein of Moggok quest. Did it twice,
guess what? Clurg's goon didn't kill me this time, but Clurg gave me
some exp. and NO stein! I am going to do this quest again and again
just to get the book. Heck, giving the book to Gregor gives you 4PP
and exp! What can I do to raise faction with the Ogres so Clurg will
give me my stein?!

A couple nights ago I thought I'd get my jeweler's kit out of the
bank that I bought 2 months ago and combine a Velium Ruby with an
Enchanted Silver bar. It said "you can not use this container for
this" or something like that. I had thrown 5 training points into
jewel making when I was level 5 so I figured I'd try it out. The I
bought a Lupis stone (I think that's what it's called) and put it in
the container with the bar and it made a necklace! I was so excited
LOL. Ok, so what do you all suggest I try to make next where the
components are somewhat cheap to buy because I am broke? Also, I want
to buy the "Enchant Silver" spell but can't seem to find it. I am in
Qeynos but none of those vendors sell it...

This is long-winded, sorry :) Have a great day everyone.
